title: Chair Yoga Stretch for Beginners, Seniors & Everyone || 30 minutes
description:
Unwind, stretch and feel amazing with this great yoga workout all done in the comfort of a chair at home. 

This video is easy to follow and is perfect for all fitness levels.  In 30 minutes you will decrease stress and relieve sore and achy muscles and joints.

As always, please go at a pace you are comfortable with and don’t push yourself. Remember to breathe (even though I’ll tell you 100 times)!

Here is the link to the great yoga shoes that I’m wearing. They are perfect for any type of mat class. They are supportive and keep your feet from slipping. Please enter “SeniorShape” at checkout so they know I sent you.
https://barreletics.com/

https://www.amazon.com/shop/seniorshapefitness
as an amazon associate/influencer I earn from qualifying purchases

Thank you for working out with me and check out my channel for more videos including: barre, strength, Pilates, chair workouts and cardio aerobics!

Follow SeniorShape on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/SeniorShapefitness/

https://www.instagram.com/seniorshape/
channelDescription:
Hello and welcome to SeniorShape with Lauren! I’m thrilled you have found my channel! I am an ACE (American Council on Exercise) certified fitness instructor. I also hold a specialization in senior fitness. 
It is my passion to create fun, new exercises and routines that are never boring. 
My videos are easy to follow and the exercises featured are specifically curated for beginners, and active older adults. The workouts are challenging and at a great pace that works well for anyone. 
Please subscribe so you never miss a new workout.

Equipment I use or recommend can be purchased on my Amazon store page www.amazon.com/shop/seniorshapefitness
*as an Amazon associate/influencer I earn from qualifying purchases

For those who have graciously asked to donate so I can continue to provide free videos can contribute through 
Venmo: @SeniorShape
I appreciate your support!

Thanks for working out with me!
Lauren
embedHtml: <iframe width="480" height="270" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/pciXaO4wtug" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
comments: I love your style of teaching!  It is so refreshing to find yoga instructors who don’t stop the flow to talk.  I absolutely loved this stretch and feel amazing after this video!
I enjoyed practicing with you this morning.  Have a blessed day.
I always feel better after your workouts. Chair yoga is harder than I thought but it does stretch every muscle.

I was hesitant to take the class, thinking it's just for 'old' people (I'm 64). I was surprised how much stretching could be done in a chair! Thank you for another excellent class. Your calm instruction and lovely piano music set a wonderful tone.
Always feel energized after a yoga session
